head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Killed When Car Hits House

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Killed When Car Hits House

body.head.byline: By AL BAKER (NYT); Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Michael A Adams of Brooklyn is killed when he loses control of his car and runs into house near Holy Cross Cemetery (NYC) (S)

block.p: A speeding driver was killed about 3 a.m. yesterday after he lost control of his BMW sedan and the car mounted a curb, ricocheted off a house and burst into flames, the police said. The man, Michael A. Adams, 22, of Winthrop Street in Brooklyn, was pronounced dead at the scene shortly after the crash on Clarendon Road, near Holy Cross Cemetery, the police said. Investigators were trying to determine why Mr. Adams was speeding.
